projects.name: Trading Bot
projects.description: Built a data-driven trading bot that automates strategies to boost execution speed, accuracy, and investment returns.

projects.name: Medical Image Segmentation using Meta Transfer Learning
projects.description: Developed a medical image segmentation system using meta transfer learning, significantly improving accuracy and efficiency to support diagnostic and treatment processes.

projects.name: Thai ID Recognition App
projects.description: Created a Thai ID recognition web app using the Google Vision API to accurately validate and verify the authenticity of Thai identification numbers.

experiences.description: Created and implemented cutting-edge quantitative models in Python and C++ to drive data-driven investment decisions. Enhanced model performance through backtesting and collaboration with traders while staying updated on advancements in quantitative finance and machine learning.
Crafted and fine-tuned tailored GPT models for clients, enhancing performance across applications like chatbots and content generation.

full_output.name: Sameer Ahmed
achievements_and_awards: 3-star rating on CodeChef, 1400+ rating on Codeforces, 450+ questions solved on LeetCode, 60+ on GeeksforGeeks, and 60+ on Coding Ninjas.
